product_name: Sea to Summit Big River Dry Bag - 8 Liters
long_description: Whether backpacking, adventure racing, trekking, boating or pack-rafting, you need to keep your gear dry and functioning. The Sea to Summit Big River 8-liter dry bag was created with you in mind. Fully taped seams and a Hypalon(TM) roll-top closure provide reliable waterproof performance. 420 denier nylon coated with a tough thermoplastic urethane makes the Sea to Summit Big River 8-liter dry bag a lightweight yet durable choice. Oval base resists rolling and stays where you put it. Durable attachment points secure sack to a pack or kayak. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Whether backpacking, adventure racing, trekking, boating or pack-rafting, you need to keep your gear dry and functioning. The Sea to Summit Big River 8-liter dry bag was created with you in mind.
